title: Eli Roth's 'Chainsaw' Short Film Will Make You Rethink Visiting Haunted Houses!
text:
Eli Roth's 'Chainsaw' Short Film Will Make You Rethink Visiting Haunted Houses! 
Published By: JustJared.com - Today 
Eli Roth has executive produced a new short film called Chainsaw that might scare you away from visiting haunted houses this Halloween seaso...
